simplifiedChinese.title: Paul Arrested in Jerusalem
simplifiedChinese.Question1: What do you like about this portion of Scripture?
simplifiedChinese.Question2: What do you observe about the ways of God?
simplifiedChinese.Question3: What do you observe about the key characters in this portion of Scripture?
simplifiedChinese.Question4: What response are you wanting to make in light of these observations?
